select h.receive_no, h.asn_bill_no, h.wh_code, h.bill_state, h.s_code, h.s_name, h.external_order_no, h.external_last_update_date, h.external_create_user, h.create_time, h.update_time, user1.real_name create_user, user2.real_name update_user from receive_header h LEFT JOIN blade_user user1 ON user1.id = h.create_user LEFT JOIN blade_user user2 ON user2.id = h.update_user LEFT JOIN receive_detail d on h.receive_id = d.receive_id
AND h.is_deleted = '0'
AND h.receive_no LIKE concat('%',#{query.receiveNo},'%')
AND h.bill_state = #{query.receiveNo}
AND d.sku_code LIKE concat('%',#{query.skuCode},'%')
AND h.external_order_no LIKE concat('%',#{query.externalOrderNo},'%')
AND h.asn_bill_no LIKE concat('%',#{query.asnBillNo},'%')
AND h.wh_code LIKE concat('%',#{query.whCode},'%')
AND h.create_time >= #{query.createTimeBegin}
AND h.create_time <= #{query.createTimeEnd}
AND h.external_create_user LIKE concat('%',#{query.externalCreateUser},'%')
AND h.s_code LIKE concat('%',#{query.sCode},'%')
order by h.create_time desc
SELECT receive_no, bill_state, wh_code, owner_code, bill_type_cd, instore_type, asn_bill_no, s_code, s_name, remark from receive_header where receive_id = #{id}
